actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.
Executive Comment Requested from Parole Comm.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to require the United States Parole Commission and the Bureau of Prisons to provide routinely to State and local law enforcement agencies certain information regarding individuals who are released from Federal penal institutions before the termination of their sentences, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to require the United States Parole Commission and the Bureau of Prisons to distribute routinely to a State or local law enforcement agency, upon request, information regarding parolees and prisoners who reside or work in such agency's jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to require the United States Parole Commission and the Bureau of Prisons to provide routinely to State and local law enforcement agencies certain information regarding individuals who are released from Federal penal institutions before the termination of their sentences, and for other purposes.
